title: Communist Party of Mexico (Marxist–Leninist)
text:
Communist Party of Mexico (Marxist–Leninist) (), is a <a href="communist">communist</a>, <a href="Anti-Revisionist">Anti-Revisionist</a> <a href="Marxist-Leninist">Marxist-Leninist</a>, <a href="Hoxhaist">Hoxhaist</a> party in <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a> which upholds the line of <a href="Enver%20Hoxha">Enver Hoxha</a>.
The party is an active member of the <a href="International%20Conference%20of%20Marxist-Leninist%20Parties%20and%20Organizations%20%28Unity%20%26amp%3B%20Struggle%29">International Conference of Marxist-Leninist Parties and Organizations (Unity & Struggle)</a>. It publishes the newspaper "Vanguardia Proletaria" and the theoretical magazine "Política".
This organization has been one of the most influential in the revolutionary left in Mexico, they have played an important part in the most significant social movements of recent years such as CGH (UNAM 1999), the Mexe Hidalgo (2000), Atenco (2003), Lazaro Cardenas (2006), Guerrero, the Commune of Oaxaca (APPO 2006).
